channel.title: Chests Bug
channel.description: There is a bug with chests. I take stuff out, then try to go into a furnace or workbench and my inventory that chests get reset like i never took anything out or put anything in. Pretty annoying.

item.title: Chests Bug
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“big_n12, post:4, topic:465274”]it’s just lag

try again should work fine.[/quote]
yea, i have this problem all the time. i’ll get something out of my chest, and when i go to use them, they just poof away and appear back in the chest. i believe lagg causes is to not realize you actually ever took something out. i’d suggest either persistence or wait till lagg calms down.

Read full topic

item.description:
@big_n12 wrote:

it’s just lag

try again should work fine.

item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Yes, unfortunately I believe it is a problem with 1.3.2 =/ That is, unless you’re losing them, then I don’t have a clue.

item.title: Chests Bug
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Do you lose the items permanently or do they come back to the chest they were in?

I think I’ve had this happen a few times to me.
